       Release dates: every game confirmed for 2021 and beyond

      <a href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/02/pokemon-go-field-research-march-missions-quests-rewards-list/">
       Pokemon Go Field Research quests | March 2021 missions and rewards list
      </a>
     </nav>

     <div class="content">
      <h1>
       VG247 - VG247.com
      </h1>
      <div id="above-fold">
       <div id="headlines">
        <p class="heading">
         Headlines
        </p>
        <div class="top-story">
         <a class="cover" data-cover="https://assets.vg247.com/current//2015/03/the_elder_scrolls_iv_oblivion-600x337.jpg" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/20/the-elder-scrolls-iv-oblivion-at-15-ted-peterson-interview/" title="The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion at 15 – The Ted Peterson Interview">
         </a>
         <div>
          <h2>
           <a href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/20/the-elder-scrolls-iv-oblivion-at-15-ted-peterson-interview/">
            The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion at 15 – The Ted Peterson Interview
           </a>
          </h2>
          <p>
           We chat to the series’ co-creator as we look back on one of that generation’s defining games and those that came before it.
          </p>
          <a class="comment-count" data-disqus-identifier="785623" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/20/the-elder-scrolls-iv-oblivion-at-15-ted-peterson-interview/#comments-section">
          </a>
          <span class="timestamp">
           2 days ago
          </span>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div id="top-stories">
         <div id="top-three">
          <div class="headlines flipped">
           <ul>
            <li>
             <a class="cover" data-cover="https://assets.vg247.com/current//2021/03/Ew4Yvw9WgAAX4E3-600x338.jpeg" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/21/dragon-age-4-concept-art-reveal/" title="More Dragon Age 4 concept art has been revealed by BioWare">
             </a>
             <div>
              <h2>
               <a href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/21/dragon-age-4-concept-art-reveal/">
                More Dragon Age 4 concept art has been revealed by BioWare
               </a>
              </h2>
              <p>
               BioWare has published new some new concept artwork for Dragon Age 4, showing off a mage armed with a gnarled old staff.
              </p>
              <a class="comment-count" data-disqus-identifier="785718" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/21/dragon-age-4-concept-art-reveal/#comments-section">
              </a>
              <span class="timestamp">
               16 hours ago
              </span>
             </div>
            </li>
            <li>
             <a class="cover" data-cover="https://assets.vg247.com/current//2019/10/battlefield_5_year_2_edition-600x492.jpg" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/21/battlefield-6-may-2021-reveal/" title="It looks like Battlefield 6 might get revealed in May">
             </a>
             <div>
              <h2>
               <a href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/21/battlefield-6-may-2021-reveal/">
                It looks like Battlefield 6 might get revealed in May
               </a>
              </h2>
              <p>
               It’s been suggested by an industry insider that Battlefield 6 might be in line for an official reveal from publisher Electronic Arts sometime in May.
              </p>
              <a class="comment-count" data-disqus-identifier="785721" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/21/battlefield-6-may-2021-reveal/#comments-section">
              </a>
              <span class="timestamp">
               14 hours ago
              </span>
             </div>
            </li>
            <li>
             <a class="cover" data-cover="https://assets.vg247.com/current//2021/03/destiny-2-battlegrounds-600x338.jpg" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/21/destiny-2-eyes-of-tomorrow-fix/" title="Don’t worry, a fix for Destiny 2’s bugged Eyes of Tomorrow is coming this week">
             </a>
             <div>
              <h2>
               <a href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/21/destiny-2-eyes-of-tomorrow-fix/">
                Don't worry, a fix for Destiny 2's bugged Eyes of Tomorrow is coming this week
               </a>
              </h2>
              <p>
               Destiny 2‘s exotic rocket launcher, Eyes of Tomorrow, has been bugged for a little while now but the Deep Stone Crypt Raid reward is finally getting fixed in an incoming update.
              </p>
              <a class="comment-count" data-disqus-identifier="785723" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/21/destiny-2-eyes-of-tomorrow-fix/#comments-section">
              </a>
              <span class="timestamp">
               15 hours ago
              </span>
             </div>
            </li>

             Terraria has sold over 35 million copies in its lifetime
            </a>
           </p>
           <p class="timestamp">

             10 hours ago
            </span>
           </p>
           <div class="meta">
            <a class="comment-count" data-disqus-identifier="785729" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/21/terraria-35-million-sales-lifetime/#comments-section">
            </a>
           </div>
          </li>
          <li class="">
           <a class="cover" data-cover="https://assets.vg247.com/current//2020/08/control-156x88.jpg" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/21/making-games-two-console-generations-time-sucks-says-control-developer/" title="Making games for two console generations at the same time ‘sucks’, says Control developer">
           </a>
           <p class="title">
            <a href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/21/making-games-two-console-generations-time-sucks-says-control-developer/">

           <p class="timestamp">
            <span class="timestamp">
             4 days ago
            </span>
           </p>
           <div class="meta">

       <div class="headlines" id="low-headlines">
        <ul>
         <li>
          <a class="cover" data-cover="https://assets.vg247.com/current//2020/06/call_of_duty_warzone_duos_2-600x338.jpg" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/19/call-of-duty-warzone-zombies-outbreak-hospital/" title="Call of Duty: Warzone’s uneventful zombie outbreak moves to the Hospital">
          </a>
          <div>
           <h2>
            <a href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/19/call-of-duty-warzone-zombies-outbreak-hospital/">
             Call of Duty: Warzone's uneventful zombie outbreak moves to the Hospital
            </a>
           </h2>
           <p>
            There’s a new infected spot in Call of Duty: Warzone’s Verdansk.
           </p>
           <a class="comment-count" data-disqus-identifier="785581" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/19/call-of-duty-warzone-zombies-outbreak-hospital/#comments-section">
           </a>
           <span class="timestamp">
            3 days ago
           </span>
          </div>
         </li>
         <li>
          <a class="cover" data-cover="https://assets.vg247.com/current//2020/12/among_us-600x309.jpg" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/19/among-us-airship-biggest-map-release-date/" title="Among Us’ Airship map arrives later this month">
          </a>
          <div>
           <h2>
            <a href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/19/among-us-airship-biggest-map-release-date/">
             Among Us' Airship map arrives later this month
            </a>
           </h2>
           <p>
            The long-awaited Among Us Airship map finally has a release date.
           </p>
           <a class="comment-count" data-disqus-identifier="785579" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/19/among-us-airship-biggest-map-release-date/#comments-section">
           </a>
           <span class="timestamp">
            3 days ago
           </span>
          </div>
         </li>
         <li>
          <a class="cover" data-cover="https://assets.vg247.com/current//2019/07/evo_logo_2-600x338.jpg" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/19/playstation-evo-acquisition-sony/" title="Sony acquires fighting game tournament Evo, but it remains open to all platforms">
          </a>
          <div>
           <h2>
            <a href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/19/playstation-evo-acquisition-sony/">
             Sony acquires fighting game tournament Evo, but it remains open to all platforms
            </a>
           </h2>
           <p>
            Evo, the premier fighting game tournament, has joined the PlayStation family.
           </p>
           <a class="comment-count" data-disqus-identifier="785577" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/19/playstation-evo-acquisition-sony/#comments-section">
           </a>
           <span class="timestamp">
            3 days ago
           </span>
          </div>
         </li>
         <li>
          <a class="cover" data-cover="https://assets.vg247.com/current//2015/02/id@xbox-logo-600x337.jpg" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/18/xbox-twitch-will-host-indie-showcase-next-week-march-26/" title="Xbox and Twitch will host an Indie Showcase next week on March 26">
          </a>
          <div>
           <h2>
            <a href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/18/xbox-twitch-will-host-indie-showcase-next-week-march-26/">
             Xbox and Twitch will host an Indie Showcase next week on March 26
            </a>
           </h2>
           <p>
            Next week, Microsoft and Twitch will team up to host an Indie Showcase featuring over 25 games.
           </p>
           <a class="comment-count" data-disqus-identifier="785567" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/18/xbox-twitch-will-host-indie-showcase-next-week-march-26/#comments-section">
           </a>
           <span class="timestamp">
            3 days ago
           </span>
          </div>
         </li>
         <li>
          <a class="cover" data-cover="https://assets.vg247.com/current//2020/08/Outriders_BC3_1-600x338.jpg" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/18/outriders-101-video/" title="This Outriders 101 video takes an in-depth look at the game">
          </a>
          <div>
           <h2>
            <a href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/18/outriders-101-video/">
             This Outriders 101 video takes an in-depth look at the game
            </a>
           </h2>
           <p>
            During the Square Enix presentation today, things kicked off with an Outriders 101 video.
           </p>
           <a class="comment-count" data-disqus-identifier="785557" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/18/outriders-101-video/#comments-section">
           </a>
           <span class="timestamp">
            3 days ago
           </span>
          </div>
         </li>
         <li>
          <a class="cover" data-cover="https://assets.vg247.com/current//2021/03/forspoken-600x311.jpg" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/18/squares-project-athia-now-known-forspoken/" title="Square’s Project Athia now known as Forspoken, coming in 2022">
          </a>
          <div>
           <h2>
            <a href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/18/squares-project-athia-now-known-forspoken/">
             Square's Project Athia now known as Forspoken, coming in 2022
            </a>
           </h2>
           <p>
            Forspoken is the name for Luminous Productions’ Project Athia.
           </p>
           <a class="comment-count" data-disqus-identifier="785552" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/18/squares-project-athia-now-known-forspoken/#comments-section">
           </a>
           <span class="timestamp">
            3 days ago
           </span>
          </div>
         </li>
         <li>
          <a class="cover" data-cover="https://assets.vg247.com/current//2021/03/black_panth_marvels_avengers-600x388.jpg" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/18/black-panther-marvels-avengers-later-year-roadmap-outlined/" title="Black Panther will come to Marvel’s Avengers later this year, roadmap outlined">
          </a>
          <div>
           <h2>
            <a href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/18/black-panther-marvels-avengers-later-year-roadmap-outlined/">
             Black Panther will come to Marvel’s Avengers later this year, roadmap outlined
            </a>
           </h2>
           <p>
            Black Panther was announced today for Marvel’s Avengers, but you’ll have to wait a bit for the character.
           </p>
           <a class="comment-count" data-disqus-identifier="785548" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/18/black-panther-marvels-avengers-later-year-roadmap-outlined/#comments-section">
           </a>
           <span class="timestamp">
            3 days ago
           </span>
          </div>
         </li>
         <li>
          <a class="cover" data-cover="https://assets.vg247.com/current//2021/03/LiS_TrueColors_KeyArt-600x443.jpg" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/18/next-life-strange-3-true-colors-trailer-release-date/" title="The next Life is Strange drops the episodic release format – and it’s out this September">
          </a>
          <div>
           <h2>
            <a href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/18/next-life-strange-3-true-colors-trailer-release-date/">
             The next Life is Strange drops the episodic release format - and it’s out this September
            </a>
           </h2>
           <p>
            The next chapter in the beloved story-driven Life is Strange series is called Life is Strange: True Colors – and you’ll be able to play it this year.
           </p>
           <a class="comment-count" data-disqus-identifier="785361" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/18/next-life-strange-3-true-colors-trailer-release-date/#comments-section">
           </a>
           <span class="timestamp">
            3 days ago
           </span>
          </div>
         </li>
         <li>
          <a class="cover" data-cover="https://assets.vg247.com/current//2020/04/sea_of_thieves-600x367.jpg" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/18/sea-of-thieves-anniversary-20-million-players/" title="Sea of Thieves is celebrating its third anniversary with over 20 million players">
          </a>
          <div>
           <h2>
            <a href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/18/sea-of-thieves-anniversary-20-million-players/">
             Sea of Thieves is celebrating its third anniversary with over 20 million players
            </a>
           </h2>
           <p>
            Sea of Thieves is celebrating its third year and the fact it has attracted over 20 million players.
           </p>
           <a class="comment-count" data-disqus-identifier="785497" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/18/sea-of-thieves-anniversary-20-million-players/#comments-section">
           </a>
           <span class="timestamp">
            3 days ago
           </span>
          </div>
         </li>
         <li>
          <a class="cover" data-cover="https://assets.vg247.com/current//2021/03/Fortnite-Chapter-2-Season-6-Agent-Jones-600x301.png" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/18/fortnite-season-6-cinematic-co-directed-russo-brothers/" title="The Avengers Russo brothers helped co-direct Fortnite’s season 6 cinematic">
          </a>
          <div>
           <h2>
            <a href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/18/fortnite-season-6-cinematic-co-directed-russo-brothers/">
             The Avengers Russo brothers helped co-direct Fortnite’s season 6 cinematic
            </a>
           </h2>
           <p>
            Earlier this week, we saw a Fortnite Chapter 2 Season 6, AKA Primal, kick off with an explosive new cinematic. Turns out, that cinematic had the expertise of none other than the Russo brothers.
           </p>
           <a class="comment-count" data-disqus-identifier="785482" href="https://www.vg247.com/2021/03/18/fortnite-season-6-cinematic-co-directed-russo-brothers/#comments-section">
           </a>
           <span class="timestamp">
            3 days ago
           </span>
          </div>
         </li>

       </li>

  <!-- Site libraries -->
  <script src="https://www.vg247.com/wp-content/themes/vg247/scripts/prototype.min.js">
  </script>
  <script src="https://www.vg247.com/wp-content/themes/vg247/scripts/jquery-2.2.4.min.js?v=1.28.5">
  </script>
  <script src="https://www.vg247.com/wp-content/themes/vg247/scripts/jquery.viewport.js">
  </script>
  <script defer="" src="https://www.vg247.com/wp-content/themes/vg247/scripts/fastclick.min.js">
  </script>
  <script defer="" src="https://www.vg247.com/wp-content/themes/vg247/scripts/Core.js?v=1.28.5">
  </script>
  <script defer="" src="https://www.vg247.com/wp-content/themes/vg247/scripts/LazyCovers.js?v=1.28.5">
  </script>
  <script src="https://www.vg247.com/wp-content/themes/vg247/scripts/AdsLoad.js?v=1.28.5">
  </script>
  <script defer="" src="https://www.vg247.com/wp-content/themes/vg247/scripts/NewsletterSignup.js?v=1.28.5">
  </script>
  <script>
   var jQuery = jQuery.noConflict();
  </script>
  <script>
   document.observe("dom:loaded", function() {

			var lazycovers = new LazyCovers(
				{
					elements: $$(".cover"),
					placeholder: "https://www.vg247.com/wp-content/themes/vg247/images/padding.gif"
				}
			);

			var newslettersignup = new NewsletterSignup({
				target: ".newsletter-signup-form",
			});

			
							var core = new Core({});
			
		});
  </script>
  <!-- Google Ads -->
  <script>
   var OA_source = 'index';
  </script>
  <!-- Advertising -->
  <script src="https://www.vg247.com/wp-content/themes/vg247/scripts/gn-ad-script.min.js?v=1.28.5">
  </script>
  <script>
   function runAds() {
		jQuery('document').ready(function()
		{

			var custom_variables = {};

			
				try {
					if(OA_source) {
						custom_variables['source'] = OA_source;
					}
				} catch(e) {}

				// Desktop lazyload spacer
				var ads_space = 450;

				
				show_inread = false;

				
				tags = "";
				if(tags) {
					custom_variables['tags'] = tags;
				}

				games = "";
				if(games) {
					custom_variables['games'] = games;
				}

				ad_policies = "";
				if(ad_policies) {
					custom_variables['ad_policies'] = ad_policies;
				}

				brand_safety = "";
				if(brand_safety) {
					custom_variables['brand_safety'] = brand_safety;
				}

				if(Cookies.get('sp')) {
					custom_variables['sp_message'] = Cookies.get('sp');
				}

				page_url = window.location.pathname;
				custom_variables['url'] = page_url.substring(0, 40);

				custom_variables['site'] = "vg247.com";

				jQuery('#sticky_leader_close').click(function(){
					ga('send', 'event', 'Sticky Leaderboard', 'Close Sticky Ad');
					jQuery('#sticky_leaderboard').fadeOut();
					document.getElementById('div-ga-VG_STICKY_LB').hidden = true;
				});

			

			
				var dfp_npa = 'false';
				custom_variables['gdpr_message'] = 'none';
				var uam_timeout = 1400;
				do_the_ads(ads_space, custom_variables, uam_timeout, device = 'desktop');


			
		});
	}

	// Check for other Amazon links and add subtag if required
	jQuery.each(jQuery('article main a'), function(i, k) {
		var link_href = jQuery(k).attr('href');
		if(link_href.match(/amazon\./i) && link_href.indexOf('ascsubtag') == -1) {

			subtag='';
			if(window.location.pathname.length > 1){
				var subtag = window.location.pathname.substring(1);
				subtag = subtag.replace(/\//g,'-').substring(0,89);
			} else {
				subtag='index';
			}
			link_href = link_href + ((link_href.indexOf('?') == -1) ? '?ascsubtag=' : '&ascsubtag=') + subtag;
			jQuery(k).attr('href', link_href);

		}
	});
  </script>
  <script>
   var disqus_shortname = 'vg247com';
  </script>
  <script>

strict";function e(n){return n.join("")}o.d(t,"b",function(){return r}),o.d(t,"a",function(){return i});var r=(o(0),"2.0.1056"),i=(e(["w","w","w",".","s","u","m","m","e","r","h","a","m","s","t","e","r",".","c","o","m"]),e(["w","w","w",".","r","o","o","s","t","e","r","f","i","r","e","w","o","r","k",".","c","o","m"]));e(["/","/","f","s","m","1","0","1","9",".","g","l","o","b","a","l",".","s","s","l",".","f","a","s","t","l","y",".","n","e","t","/","f","s","m","/","d","s"]),e(["h","t","t","p","s",":","/","/","d","2","z","v","5","r","k","i","i","4","6","m","i","q",".","c","l","o","u","d","f","r","o","n","t",".","n","e","t","/","0","/","2",".","0",".","1","0","5","6","/","r","e","c","o","v","e","r","y","_","d","f","p","_","i","n","t","e","r","n","a","l","-","v","2",".","0",".","1","0","5","6",".","j","s"]),e(["h","t","t","p","s",":","/","/","d","2","z","v","5","r","k","i","i","4","6","m","i","q",".","c","l","o","u","d","f","r","o","n","t",".","n","e","t","/","0","/","2",".","0",".","1","0","5","6","/","r","e","c","o","v","e","r","y","_","l","i","b","_","a","p","i","_","i","f","r","a","m","e","-","v","2",".","0",".","1","0","5","6",".","h","t","m","l"]),e(["h","t","t","p","s",":","/","/","d","2","z","v","5","r","k","i","i","4","6","m","i","q",".","c","l","o","u","d","f","r","o","n","t",".","n","e","t","/","0","/","2",".","0",".","1","0","5","6","/","r","e","c","o","v","e","r","y","_","l","i","b","_","r","i","d","_","i","f","r","a","m","e","-","v","2",".","0",".","1","0","5","6",".","h","t","m","l"])},function(n,t,o){"use strict";function e(n,t){function o(n){try{return n&&n.timeStamp?n.timeStamp:window.performance.now()}catch(n){return Date.now()}}var e=arguments.length>2&&void 0!==arguments[2]?arguments[2]:window.location,l=arguments.length>3&&void 0!==arguments[3]?arguments[3]:window.navigator,f=arguments.length>4&&void 0!==arguments[4]?arguments[4]:{},p=document.createElement("a");if(p.href=n,"https:"===e.protocol&&p.protocol!==e.protocol)return r.error("protocol mismatch in https environment, standing down"),void t(!1,!1,p.protocol,s);var v=new XMLHttpRequest,g=f.withCredentials;null!=g&&(v.withCredentials=g);try{v.open(f.method||"GET",n)}catch(n){return void t(!0,!1,n.toString(),c,v)}if(null!=f.headers){var m=f.headers;Object.keys(m).forEach(function(n){v.setRequestHeader(n,m[n])})}var w=void 0,b=void 0;v.onloadstart=function(n){w=o(n)},v.onreadystatechange=function(n){if(4===this.readyState){b=o(n)-w;var e=0===this.status&&!1!==l.onLine,r="2"===this.status.toString()[0],c=void 0;return c=r?a:!1===l.onLine?u:i,void t(e,r,this.status+"::"+b,c,v)}};try{v.send(f.body)}catch(n){return void t(!0,!1,n.toString(),d,v)}}t.a=e;var r=o(0),i="n",a="nx",c="xo",d="xs",s="p",u="of"},function(n,t,o){"use strict";function e(){var n=arguments.length>0&&void 0!==arguments[0]?arguments[0]:document,t=[],o=[],e=r.bind(null,t),i=r.bind(null,o);return n.addEventListener("load",e,!0),n.addEventListener("error",i,!0),{load:{events:t,listener:e},error:{events:o,listener:i}}}function r(n,t){if(t.target){var o="string"==typeof t.target.tagName?t.target.tagName.toLowerCase():"",e="string"==typeof t.target.src?t.target.src:"";"iframe"!==o&&n.push({tagName:o,src:e})}}t.a=e;o(0)}]);
            //# sourceMappingURL=https://s3.amazonaws.com/d3jlsadfjkuern/2.0.1056/Ym9vdHN0cmFwLmpz.map
		    window ._sp_ =  window ._sp_ || {};
		 	window ._sp_.config =  window ._sp_.config || {};
			window ._sp_.config.account_id = 347;
			window ._sp_.config.mms_domain =  'vg247-uk.vg247.com';
			window ._sp_.mms =  window ._sp_.mms || {};
			window ._sp_.mms.cmd =  window ._sp_.mms.cmd || [];
			window ._sp_.config.mms_client_data_callback =  function (o) {
				var _sp_msg_id = parseInt(o.info.msg_id);
				var _sp_cookie_val = "";
				if(o.d.abp==true && _sp_msg_id>0) {
					Cookies.set("sp", "sp_message_seen", { expires: 30 });
				}
			};
			window._sp_.config.fsm_endpoint = "//vg247-p2.vg247.com";
			window._sp_.config.enable_fsm_detection = true;
			window._sp_.config.enable_fsm_network_detection = true;
			window ._sp_.mms.cmd.push( function () {
                                    window ._sp_.mms.setTargeting( "show-ads", "true" );
                                            });
			window ._sp_.mms.cmd.push( function () {
			 	window ._sp_.mms.startMsg();
			});
			window ._sp_.bootstrap( 'https://www.vg247.com/wp-content/themes/vg247/scripts/mvg247-fsm.js' );
		}
  </script>
  <script>
   function runGeoriot() {
				var s = document.createElement('script');
				s.type = 'text/javascript';
				s.async = true;
				s.onload = function() { triggerGeoriot() };
				s.src = '//cdn.georiot.com/snippet.js';
				document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(s);

			}

			function triggerGeoriot() {
				var tsid = 8509;
				Georiot.amazon.convertToGeoRiotLinks(tsid);
			}
  </script>
  <script src="https://www.vg247.com/wp-content/themes/vg247/scripts/js-cookie.js?v=1.28.5">
  </script>
  <script>
   const frames = window.frames;
		for (let i = 0; i < frames.length; i++) {
			frames[i].stop();
		}

		function sandboxIframes() {
			const iframes = jQuery('iframe[src]');

			jQuery.each(iframes, function() {
				const iframe = jQuery(this);
				// Youtube iframes are exempt from being sandboxed
				// as long as we swap them for the Privacy Enhanced player
				if(iframe.attr('src').match(/youtube(-nocookie)?\.com\/embed/i)) {
					iframe.attr('src', iframe.attr('src').replace('youtube.com', 'youtube-nocookie.com'));
				} else {
					iframe.attr('data-src', iframe.attr('src'));
					iframe.attr('alt', 'Please accept cookies to see this iframe.');
					iframe.removeAttr('src');
				}
			});
		}

		function sandboxScripts() {
			const scripts = jQuery('script[src]:not(.ignore-script)');

			jQuery.each(scripts, function() {
				const script = jQuery(this);
				script.attr('type', 'text/plain');
				script.attr('data-src', script.attr('src'));
				script.removeAttr('src');
			});
		}

		function runIframes() {
			var iframes = jQuery('iframe[src]');
			jQuery.each(iframes, function() {
				const iframe = jQuery(this);
				iframe.attr('src', iframe.attr('src').replace('youtube-nocookie.com', 'youtube.com'));
			});

			var iframes = jQuery('iframe[data-src]');
			jQuery.each(iframes, function() {
				const iframe = jQuery(this);
				src = iframe.attr('data-src');

				// Now we have targeting consent we can swap the
				// privacy-enhanced players back to the regular version
				if(src.match(/youtube-nocookie\.com\/embed/i)) {
					src = src.replace('youtube-nocookie.com', 'youtube.com');
				}
				iframe.attr('src', src);
				iframe.removeAttr('alt');
				iframe.removeAttr('data-src');
			});
		}

		function runScripts() {
			const scripts = jQuery('script[data-src]:not(.ignore-script)');
			jQuery.each(scripts, function() {
				const script = jQuery(this);
				script.attr('src', script.attr('data-src'));
				script.attr('type', 'text/javascript');
				script.removeAttr('alt');
				script.removeAttr('data-src');
			});
		}

		function runCarbon() {
			!function(a,l,b,c,k,s,t,g,A){a.CustomerConnectAnalytics=k,a[k]=a[k]||function(){
			(a[k].q=a[k].q||[]).push(arguments)},g=l.createElement(b),A=l.getElementsByTagName(b)[0],
			g.type="text/javascript",g.async=!0,g.src=c+"?id="+s+"&parentId="+t,A.parentNode.insertBefore(g,A)
			}(window,document,"script","//carbon-cdn.ccgateway.net/script","cca",window.location.hostname,"04d6b31292");
		}

		var _comscore = _comscore || [];
		_comscore.push({ c1: "2", c2: "8518622" });
		function runComscore() {
			(function() {
				var s = document.createElement("script");
				el = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
				s.async = true;
				s.src = "https://sb.scorecardresearch.com/beacon.js";
				el.parentNode.insertBefore(s, el);
			})();
		}

		function runDisqusCounter() {
		    var s = document.createElement('script'); s.async = true;
		    s.type = 'text/javascript';
		    s.src = '//a.disquscdn.com/count.js';
		    (document.getElementsByTagName('HEAD')[0] || document.getElementsByTagName('BODY')[0]).appendChild(s);
		}

		function runFacebookPixel() {
			!function(f,b,e,v,n,t,s){if(f.fbq)return;n=f.fbq=function(){n.callMethod?
			n.callMethod.apply(n,arguments):n.queue.push(arguments)};if(!f._fbq)f._fbq=n;
			n.push=n;n.loaded=!0;n.version='2.0';n.queue=[];t=b.createElement(e);t.async=!0;
			t.src=v;s=b.getElementsByTagName(e)[0];s.parentNode.insertBefore(t,s)}(window,
			document,'script','//connect.facebook.net/en_US/fbevents.js');

			fbq('init', '1749355691872662');
							fbq('init', '738979179819818');
						fbq('track', 'PageView');
		}

		function runSkimlinks() {
			var s = document.createElement('script');
			s.type = 'text/javascript';
			s.async = true;
			s.src = '//s.skimresources.com/js/87431X1540266.skimlinks.js';
			document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(s);
		}

		function youtubeParser(url){
			var regExp = /^.*((youtu.be\/)|(v\/)|(\/u\/\w\/)|(embed\/)|(watch\?))\??v?=?([^#\&\?]*).*/;
			var match = url.match(regExp);
			return (match&&match[7].length==11)? match[7] : false;
		}

		function runBBMVS() {
			jQuery('article main iframe').each(function(){
				src = jQuery(this).attr('src');
				if(src) {
					check_yt = youtubeParser(src);
					if(check_yt){
						jQuery(this).attr('id', 'yt-' + check_yt);
						jQuery(this).attr('data-yt-id', check_yt);
						jQuery(this).addClass('yt-embed');
					}
				}
			});
			var promises = [];
			jQuery('article main iframe.yt-embed').each(function() {
				check_yt = jQuery(this).attr('data-yt-id');
				(function(replace_yt) {
					promises.push(jQuery.getJSON( "https://gamernetwork.bbvms.com/json/search?query=%22" + replace_yt + "%22&context=all", function( data ) {
						if(typeof data['items'][0] !== 'undefined' && typeof data['items'][0].id !== 'undefined') {
							yt_video = jQuery('#yt-' + replace_yt);
							jQuery(yt_video).attr('data-bbvms-id', data['items'][0]['id']);
						};
					}));
				})(check_yt);
			});
			Promise.all(promises).then(function( data ) {
				first_yt = true;
				jQuery("[data-bbvms-id]").each(function() {
					yt_video_wrapper = jQuery(this).parent();
					if(first_yt) {
						playout_id = 'vg247_autoplay';
						first_yt = false;
					} else {
						playout_id = 'vg247';
					}
					jQuery(yt_video_wrapper).after('<figure class="video"><div class="bb_wrapper"><script type="text/javascript" src="//gamernetwork.bbvms.com/p/' + playout_id + '/c/' + jQuery(this).attr('data-bbvms-id') + '.js" async="true"><\/script></div><div class="watch-button"><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=' + jQuery(this).attr('data-yt-id') + '" target="_blank" onclick="ga(\'send\',\'event\',\'Video\',\'Click YT Link\',\'' + jQuery(this).attr('data-yt-id') + '\')" class="button">Watch on YouTube</a></div></div>');
					jQuery(yt_video_wrapper).remove();
				});
			});

		}
  </script>
  <script>
   // Global site tag (gtag.js) - Google Analytics
	window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
	function gtag() { dataLayer.push(arguments); }

	function runGoogleAnalytics(anonymous) {

		
		if (window.gtagDone) return;

		gtag('js', new Date());
		gtag('set', 'allow_ad_personalization_signals', true);

		var dimension_map = {
			'dimension1': 'article_type',
			'dimension2': 'article_tags',
			'dimension3': 'article_author'
		};

		var ga_custom = {};

		
		var ga_opts = {};
		if(anonymous) {

			ga_opts = {
				'link_attribution': true,
				'client_storage': 'none',
				'store_gac': false,
				'anonymize_ip': true,
				'custom_map': dimension_map
			};
		} else {
			ga_opts = {
				'link_attribution': true,
				'custom_map': dimension_map
			};
		}

		ga_opts = Object.assign({}, ga_opts, ga_custom);
		gtag('config', 'UA-3505225-1', ga_opts);

		window.gtagDone = true;

		var ga_script = document.createElement("script");
		ga_script.type = "text/javascript";
		ga_script.async = true;
		ga_script.src = "https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=UA-3505225-1";
		document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(ga_script);
	}
  </script>
  <!-- OneTrust Cookies Consent Notice -->
  <script charset="UTF-8" class="ignore-script" data-domain-script="3e103126-0f7b-447b-8f8c-704bca5f2cad" src="https://cdn.cookielaw.org/scripttemplates/otSDKStub.js" type="text/javascript">
  </script>
  <script>
   sandboxIframes();
		sandboxScripts();

		function OptanonWrapper() {

			// Run performance
			if(OptanonActiveGroups.match(/,2,/)){
				runComscore();
				runGoogleAnalytics(false);
			} else {
				runGoogleAnalytics(true);
			}

			// Run functional
			if(OptanonActiveGroups.match(/,3,/)){
				runSourcepoint();
			}

			// Run targeting
			if(OptanonActiveGroups.match(/,4,/)){
				runIframes();
				runScripts();
				if(typeof runSidebarAds === "function") {
					runSidebarAds();
				}
				runDisqusCounter();
				runCarbon();
				runFacebookPixel();
				runGeoriot();
				runSkimlinks();
				runBBMVS();

				if(typeof runGMC === "function") {
					runGMC();
				}

				if(typeof runSearch === "function") {
					runSearch();
				}
			}

			__tcfapi('getTCData', 2, (tcData, success) => {

				if(success) {
					if(tcData.purpose.consents[1]) {
						runAds();
					}
				}

			});

		}
  </script>
  <script src="//cdn.gamer-network.net/2018/scripts/edmonds/1.3.2/edmonds.js">
  </script>
  <script>
   jQuery(document).ready(function() {
          renderEdmonds('.edmonds-block', {
              'site': 'vg247.com',
              
          });
      });
  </script>
  <script>
   function yafaIt() {
            var ads = document.querySelectorAll('[data-dfp-id]');
            for(var i = 0;i < ads.length;i++)
            {
				var ad = ads[i];
				if( ad.hasAttribute("data-yafa-img") ) {
					var yafa_click = ad.getAttribute("data-yafa-click");
					var yafa_img = ad.getAttribute("data-yafa-img");
					var yafa_target = ad.getAttribute("data-yafa-target");
					var yafa_style = ad.getAttribute("data-yafa-style");
					var yafa_linktarget = ad.getAttribute("data-yafa-linktarget");
					var yafa_linkheight = 0;
					if( ad.hasAttribute("data-yafa-linkheight") ) {
						yafa_linkheight = ad.getAttribute("data-yafa-linkheight");
					}
					var tgt = jQuery(yafa_target);
					tgt.attr(
						'style', 'background-image: url(' + yafa_img + ');' + yafa_style
					);
					jQuery('html').bind('mousemove', function(e) {
						if( (jQuery('#page-wrapper, #inner-wrapper, .page').is(e.target)) && (yafa_linkheight == 0 || e.pageY <=yafa_linkheight ) ) {
							jQuery('html').css({ 'cursor' :'pointer' });
						} else {
							jQuery('html').css({ 'cursor' :'auto' });
						}
					});
					jQuery('html').bind('click', function (e) { 
						if( (jQuery('#page-wrapper, #inner-wrapper, .page').is(e.target)) && (yafa_linkheight == 0 || e.pageY <=yafa_linkheight ) ) {
							window.open(yafa_click,'_top');
						}
					});
				}
                jQuery(ad).hide();
            }
        }
  </script>
  <script src="https://www.vg247.com/wp-includes/js/wp-embed.min.js?ver=4.9.3" type="text/javascript">
  </script>
 </body>
</html>
